oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jesus Name Tradition service home movie, 1974 January
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording begins with home footage of Larry Elledge recovering from bite. Johnny Holbrook and members pray over Larry. Recording goes on to show service with Larry Elledge in attendance. Members dancing, handle serpents and fire. Children handle fire. Woman becomes slain in the spirit. Man burns his neck.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Imposition of hands; Lay preaching; Prayer; Slain in the Spirit; Snakebites; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region
Elledge, Larry; Holbrook, Johnny
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Jesus Name tradition services home movies
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Mary Vance Jesus Name Tradition photographs and home movies
